alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:19PM CST until January 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Iowa and east central and southeast Nebraska. * WHEN...From 6 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions may impact Wednesday afternoon and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
